events.name: Anaheim Ducks at New York Rangers

headlines.description: Chris Kreider scored twice to move into third place on New York's career goals list, Jonathan Quick made 29 saves to continue his stellar start and the Rangers beat the Anaheim Ducks 5-1 on Friday night.
headlines.shortLinkText: Kreider scores twice, Quick makes 29 saves to help Rangers beat Ducks 5-1

video.headline: Mika Zibanejad scores power-play goal vs. Ducks

tracking.trackingName: NHL_One-Play (Mika Zibanejad scores power-play goal vs. Ducks) 2023/12/16 ESHEET
